newsitem.title: USA: Tetra Tech signs contract for $230 mln.
newsitem.headline: Tetra Tech signs contract for $230 mln.

text.p: Tetra Tech Inc on Thursday said it has signed a contract valued at $230 million to provide scientific and engineering services for the U.S. Evironmental Protection Agency Region 5 Superfund program.
The contract follows a $250 million deal for Region 6 that was signed in September and it is part of a larger package of work for which Tetra-Tech won the right to negotiate in 1996.

Under the new deal, Tetra-Tech will perform site investigations, remedial design, remedial actions/operations and other services at hazardous waste sites Illinois, Indiana, Ohio, Michigan, Wisconsin and Minnesota.
